details.title: Aldergrove Community Station Hub
details.description: The proposed ACSH incorporates the Neighborhood House model and Community Food Centre model under one roof ~ support for children, youth, families and seniors living with food security issues to access food services in a welcoming place.

details.title: Contact Us
details.description: For more information please contact us at 604-533-1679 or info@lmow.ca Monday – Friday 8:30-4:00pm

details.title: Pay Bills
details.description:
Invoices will be delivered via email, mail or with your driver the first week of each month.
Pay your monthly invoice by:
Cash, Cheque,
Credit/Debit Card,
E-Transfer,
PayPal

details.title: Volunteer
details.description: Volunteers have many opprotunities such as: - meal deliver and packing, working in our kitchen and general office help. Contact us for more information on how you can help

details.title: Donate
details.description: Cash donations are accepted and can go toward our programs and meal subsidy. More information can be found on the donate page.

details.title: COVID-19 Updates
details.description: Protecting our clients, volunteers, and staff is a priority. Click here to see our COVID-19 Updates

details.title: Together We Deliver
details.description:
We have been serving fresh, wholesome meals, delivered right to your door in Langley for over 40 years. We have fresh hot meal options along with frozen options.

Our caring volunteers provide friendly social interaction for those living alone. We help our clients feel safe knowing that a volunteer will check on their well-being on delivery days and we will respond quickly if an emergency arises.

We help people to retain independence in the comfort of their own homes.

In addition to our meal delivery program, we also reach our community through programs like Food & Friends and Healthy Living Bags

Protecting our clients, volunteers, and staff is a priority.

details.title: Volunteer Opportunities
details.description: We're always looking for more help. Click below to learn more about how you can help support your local communitry.

details.title: Delivering services to our community for all to be fed, connected, and supported.
